text: The Boy in Blue is a 1986 Canadian biographical drama movie directed by Charles Jarrott and starring Nicolas Cage, Cynthia Dale, Christopher Plummer, Sean Sullivan, David Naughton, Melody Anderson, Jeff Wincott. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1986 drama movies Category:1980s biographical movies Category:Canadian biographical movies Category:Canadian drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Charles Jarrott
title: The Boy in Blue (1986 movie)
